sentences.en: A small flywheel that regulates the speed of a spinning wheel.
sentences.cn: 锭盘:调整手纺车速度的小飞轮.

sentences.en: Because of its weight, the flywheel helps to smooth engine operation.
sentences.cn: 飞轮通过本身的质量使发动机运转平稳.

sentences.en: Facing on flywheel side of disc torn, gouged, or worn.
sentences.cn: 离合器片在飞轮侧的表面撕裂 、 擦伤或磨损.

sentences.en: Flywheel is an important executive component of satellite attitude control system.
sentences.cn: 飞轮是卫星姿态控制系统的关键执行元件.

sentences.en: It is to make the engine flywheel hole taper as clutch active.
sentences.cn: 它是将发动机飞轮的内孔做成锥体作为离合器的主动件.

sentences.en: Position flywheel and O ring on crankshaft and align bolt holes.
sentences.cn: 安装飞轮和O形环在曲轴上并对齐螺栓孔.

sentences.en: Remove the flywheel or converter drive platDiscard the old bolts.
sentences.cn: 拆卸飞轮和转换器驱动圆盘.扔掉旧的螺栓.

sentences.en: Remove the remaining converter ( or engine flywheel ) housing bolts.
sentences.cn: 卸去其他的转换器壳体 ( 或引擎飞轮 ) 螺栓.

sentences.en: The "flywheel" battery, it is said, could power an electric car for 600 miles on a single charge.
sentences.cn: 据说“飞轮”电池充电一次就能驱动电动汽车行驶600英里。

sentences.en: The clutch disc fits between the flywheel and the pressure plate.
sentences.cn: 离合器片安装在飞轮和压盘之间.

sentences.en: The flywheel provides a mounting location for the clutch assembly as well.
sentences.cn: 飞轮为离合器总成提供了安装位置.

sentences.en: There are principally two types of system - battery ( electrical ) and flywheel ( mechanical ).
sentences.cn: 现在该系统有两种主要的类型 - 电池 ( 电子型 ) 和飞轮 ( 机械型 ).

sentences.en: This side will press the clutch disc facing are against the flywheel.
sentences.cn: 这方面将面临按离合器盘是对飞轮.

sentences.en: Use hammer and brass drift to tap ring gear onto the flywheel.
sentences.cn: 用锤子和黄铜冲销轻轻敲打环齿轮进入飞轮.

sentences.en: You can see the flywheel mechanism and the little sounding wire.
sentences.cn: 你可以在图片中看到飞轮装置和小测深绳.

trans.tran_en: a heavy wheel that keeps a machine working at a steady speed
